title: Researchers call on Cleobury Mortimer residents to help shape policing (The University of Warwick)
text: ( Source : The University of Warwick ) Residents living in Cleobury Mortimer are being encouraged to complete a short online survey which will help shape the future of policing and put them in with a chance of winning Â£ 100 . The town has been
